original_text: Jesus replied, ‘The people who are alive today are very bad. They do not obey God, but they want God to show them something powerful. But God will not do this for them. They will only see the same powerful thing that God did for his prophet Jonah.
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하여 이르시되 악하고 음란한 세대가 표적을 구하나 선지자 요나의 표적 밖에는 보일 표적이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: The people who are alive today are very bad
but they want God to show them something powerful
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 하나님께서 강력한 것을 보여주시길 원한다

sentences.original_text: But God will not do this for them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님께서는 그들을 위해 이것을 하지 않으실 것이다

sentences.original_text: the same powerful thing that God did for his prophet Jonah
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그의 선지자 요나를 위해 행하셨던 그 강력한 것을
